mapper.sql: MbrWineCustomDetail.id as id, MbrWineCustomDetail.wine_custom_id as wine_custom_id, MbrWineCustomDetail.wine_custom_element_id as wine_custom_element_id, MbrWineCustomDetail.mbr_wine_custom_id as mbr_wine_custom_id, MbrWineCustomDetail.mbr_id as mbr_id, MbrWineCustomDetail.bg_img as bg_img, MbrWineCustomDetail.mask_img as mask_img, MbrWineCustomDetail.preview_img as preview_img, MbrWineCustomDetail.bottom_img as bottom_img, MbrWineCustomDetail.print_img as print_img, MbrWineCustomDetail.create_date as create_date, MbrWineCustomDetail.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_wine_custom_detail (id, wine_custom_id, wine_custom_element_id, mbr_wine_custom_id, mbr_id, bg_img, mask_img, preview_img, bottom_img, print_img, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineCustomId}, #{wineCustomElementId}, #{mbrWineCustomId}, #{mbrId}, #{bgImg}, #{maskImg}, #{previewImg}, #{bottomImg}, #{printImg}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_wine_custom_detail
wine_custom_id = #{wineCustomId},
wine_custom_element_id = #{wineCustomElementId},
mbr_wine_custom_id = #{mbrWineCustomId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
bg_img = #{bgImg},
mask_img = #{maskImg},
preview_img = #{previewImg},
bottom_img = #{bottomImg},
print_img = #{printImg},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into m_mbr_wine_custom_detail (id, wine_custom_id, wine_custom_element_id, mbr_wine_custom_id, mbr_id, bg_img, mask_img, preview_img, bottom_img, print_img, create_date, modify_date) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.wineCustomId}, #{item.wineCustomElementId}, #{item.mbrWineCustomId}, #{item.mbrId}, #{item.bgImg}, #{item.maskImg}, #{item.previewImg}, #{item.bottomImg}, #{item.printImg}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifyDate})
